#id=1
#text=A few weeks ago I decided that it was time for me to get a hair cut .
#id=2
#text=Normally it is recommended to get a hair cut every six months , but I had gone quite a bit longer .
#id=3
#text=The ends of my hair were splitting , and my bangs were getting longer than I liked them to be .
#id=4
#text=I decided to go back to Great Clips , which is a chain that has a location near where I live .
#id=5
#text=They do not require an appointment , although you can check-in online ahead of time , so I decided to walk in .
#id=6
#text=I drove to the location and found a parking place easily , and there was only one or two other customers there at the time .
#id=7
#text=I walked in and gave my name , and they had a record of what I had done at my previous visits .
#id=8
#text=The woman who took my name and I told her that I wanted a shampoo and a hair cut .
#id=9
#text=She said that she could start right away and led me to a section where I could leave my phone and wallet .
#text=I put those down , and followed her over to the chair for the shampoo .
#text=It was very relaxing and did not take much time .
#text=We then went back to her section and she asked what I wanted done .
#text=I explained I just wanted about an inch taken off of most of my hair , but my bangs to be cut so they were more above my eyes again .
#text=We did n't really talk much while she was cutting my hair , and it took her less than ten minutes .
#text=I did not want my hair blow dried , so she left it wet .
#text=I went back to the front of the shop with her to pay , and I also made sure to leave her a tip .
#text=I left the shop and was very pleased with my hair cut .
